title: Ep 26: Elin Hilderbrand
itunes:title: Ep 26: Elin Hilderbrand
itunes:subtitle: If you haven’t heard me evangelize the brilliantly beachy books of Elin Hilderbrand, you are not paying attention. But now you’re going to have to, because Elin joins us today! Her 24th novel, 28 Summers, is out June 16! If you haven’t read your first ...
description:
If you haven’t heard me evangelize the brilliantly beachy books of Elin Hilderbrand, you are not paying attention. But now you’re going to have to, because Elin joins us today! Her 24th novel, 28 Summers, is out June 16! If you haven’t read your first Elin yet, what are you waiting for! 


Follow along with recs (and share your own via DM) on the “Gee Thanks, Just Bought It!” Instagram: www.instagram.com/geethanksjustboughtitpod


Elin and I discuss cooking, writing, exercise, and her product pick (which makes a great gift for you OR for someone else). Also I just fangirl out like no tomorrow.


Mentioned On This Episode!

  • The Elin Hilderbrand Book Collection: https://www.elinhilderbrand.net/ and https://www.amazon.com/shop/geethanksjustboughtit?listId=2WFY67Z0LEID6&ref=idea_share_inf
  • The Food52 Pepper Grinder: https://fave.co/2Zn6ijH
  • The Peloton Bike: https://www.onepeloton.com/
  • Pre-order 28 Summers from my favorite indie, Amherst Books!: https://www.amherstbooks.com/ 


Elin Hilderbrand in New York Magazine: https://www.thecut.com/2019/06/how-elin-hilderbrand-became-the-queen-of-beach-reads.html


PS. If you aren’t listening to Doree and Kate’s new podcast, HERE FOR YOU, it’s a great way to both acknowledge the state of the world while also not overwhelming yourself (as I tend to do). Listen here: https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/here-for-you/id1503438711


Thanks for listening!

Site Makeover Alert! Check out blog posts and all of the recommended products by past guests, listeners and Caroline at www.geethanksjustboughtit.com 

Shop the Amazon store! https://www.amazon.com/shop/geethanksjustboughtit

Join the book club! We’re reading Wow, No Thank You by Samantha Irby: https://www.instagram.com/p/B-kvVHqnKiH/

The Spreadsheet is UNDER CONSTRUCTION and it will be back soon, better than ever!

Follow along with recs (and share your own via DM) on the “Gee Thanks, Just Bought It!” Instagram: www.instagram.com/geethanksjustboughtitpod


We have a phone number! Call it! You may be featured on an upcoming special listeners-only ep of the podcast: 424-245-0736.

Want to get in touch more formally? Have a rec you want to rec? Shoot me an email! Caroline@geethanksjustboughtit.com



Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
